instruction: Implement time-series forecasting models to predict future values based on historical data. Use ARIMA, Prophet, or other forecasting techniques to build predictive models and evaluate their performance using appropriate metrics.
description: Build time-series forecasting models using statistical and machine learning approaches. Implement ARIMA, Prophet, and other forecasting techniques with performance evaluation.
keywords: forecasting, ARIMA, Prophet, time-series, prediction, python, statsmodels, fbprophet, model evaluation
